title: an unexpected error has occurred while logging in LoL
body: Can't enter the game.. i re-install but it not helping...

replies.body: I'd like to help out here, but I need some more info.  When you say can't enter game do you mean an actual match after champion select or into the client?  What does the error message say exactly?

I believe I am running into the same error as him. The error message says "An unexpected error has occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com"

I cannot log into the client using any of my 3 builds, on any region, and also on multiple accounts. Not sure what the issue is here.

Running windows 10, and I have gone through the steps on the support site including configuring DNS.

i know how to fix this error. it works for me. 
go to https://www.hotspotshield.com/ and download it and it will fix this error.
Share this with to help more players!
mine is doing the same thing..ever since I updated my windows laptop I now cant log in {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
